details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.18 Annotations - 7.18.4 Forms - Widget annotation
details.description: A Widget annotation shall be nested within a Form tag per ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.5, Table 340.

rule.description: A Widget annotation shall be nested within a Form tag per ISO 32000-1:2008, 14.8.4.5, Table 340.

error.message: A widget annotation is not nested within a Form tag
